DOC.brief_summary: PF-03635659 develop treatment chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . This study examine safety , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics PF-03635659 patient Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Examine The Safety , Pharmacokinetics And Pharmacodynamics Of PF-03635659 In Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Male female ( woman nonchildbearing potential ) subject age 40 80 year , inclusive diagnosis moderate COPD ( GOLD , 2007 update ) meet follow criterion GOLD stage II disease Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 35.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 40 kg ( 88 lb ) . Current smoker , exsmokers abstain smoke least 6 month Subjects 2 exacerbation require treatment oral steroid hospitalization treatment COPD previous year . History low respiratory tract infection significant disease instability month precede screen period screen randomization .
